response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This extraordinary item holds immense value, worth $1,200,000 to you, and we are excited to offer it to you at a special introductory price. Our proposal is to extend this remarkable asset to you for $1,100,000. We believe this is an exceptional deal, allowing you to secure a piece of unparalleled quality at a competitive advantage. Please let us know if you wish to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 1100000}
